# BAM Mobile App - React Native Expo Project

## Project Overview
Mobile application for BAM (Bouteille Ã  la Mer) - A geolocation-based community reporting app.

## Tech Stack
- React Native with Expo (managed workflow)
- TypeScript
- Supabase (Auth + Database)
- React Navigation (Stack + Tab)
- React Native Maps
- Expo Location, Camera, Notifications
- AsyncStorage

## Project Structure
```
/src
  /components     - Reusable UI components
  /screens        - App screens (Auth, Map, Profile, etc.)
  /navigation     - Navigation configuration
  /services       - API and Supabase services
  /hooks          - Custom React hooks
  /utils          - Helper functions
  /types          - TypeScript type definitions
  /constants      - App constants and config
```

## Backend API
Base URL: https://bam-api-supabase.vercel.app
